io.jenetics.prngine

Class MT19937_32Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • io.jenetics.prngine.PRNG
        • io.jenetics.prngine.Random32
          • io.jenetics.prngine.MT19937_32Random
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MT19937_32Random.ThreadSafe

    public class MT19937_32Random
extends Random32
    This is a 32-bit version of Mersenne Twister pseudorandom number generator.

    References: M. Matsumoto and T. Nishimura, "Mersenne Twister: a 623-dimensionally equidistributed uniform pseudorandom number generator". ACM Transactions on Modeling and Computer Simulation 8. (Jan. 1998) 3--30.

    This is a port of the trng::mt19937 PRNG class of the TRNG library created by Heiko Bauke.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Franz Wilhelmst√∂tter
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MT19937_32Random.ThreadLocal
      This class represents a thread local implementation of the MT19937_32Random PRNG.
      static class  MT19937_32Random.ThreadSafe
      This is a thread safe variation of the this PRNG—by synchronizing the random number generation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SEED_BYTES
      The number of seed bytes (2,496) this PRNG requires.

    • Field Detail

      • SEED_BYTES

        public static final int SEED_BYTES
        The number of seed bytes (2,496) this PRNG requires.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • MT19937_32Random

        public MT19937_32Random(byte[] seed)
        Create a new not thread-safe instance of the MT19937_32Random engine. 
        
 final byte[] seed = MT19937_32Random.seedBytes();
 final Random random = new MT19937_32Random(seed);
        Parameters:
        seed - the random seed value. The seed must be (at least) SEED_BYTES long.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given seed is shorter than SEED_BYTES
        See Also:
        seedBytes()

      • MT19937_32Random

        public MT19937_32Random(long seed)
        Create a new not thread-safe instance of the MT19937_32Random engine. The constructed PRNG is equivalent with 
        
 final long seed = ...;
 final Random random = new MT19937_32Random();
 random.setSeed(seed);
        which is there for compatibility reasons with the Java Random engine.
        Parameters:
        seed - the random seed value

      • MT19937_32Random

        public MT19937_32Random()
        Return a new random engine with a safe seed value.

    • Method Detail

      • nextInt

        public int nextInt()
        Description copied from class: Random32
        Force to explicitly override the Random.nexInt() method. All other methods of this class are implemented by calling this method.
        Specified by:

      • seedBytes

        public static byte[] seedBytes()
        Create a new seed byte array suitable for this PRNG. The returned seed array is SEED_BYTES long.
        Returns:
        a new seed byte array of length SEED_BYTES
        See Also:
